name: Traffic Quad Bike Rider: End-Less Road Rac-ing 3D
name_original: Traffic Quad Bike Rider: End-Less Road Rac-ing 3D
description:
Have you dream to ride your Quad bike with brand new and exciting challenge? If yes; then play now this innovative game with amazing environment and new scenic scenarios of roads. Crazy quad bike riding is endless racing simulation game. In this racing simulation game you must enjoy awesome ride of ATV quad bike around the big city roads. Crazy quad bike racing brings you a mind-blowing ATV game filled with fun! Here you get super quad bike for riding through vast traffic city roads. Take control of quad bike and cope with hurdles and obstacles through riding.
first one is endless mode in this mode you can ride your bike till to crash, if you crash with any vehicles you will fail and need to restart. In this mode you need to ride your bike carefully and collect coin as much as you can. In second mode you have limited time for unlimited fun, ride your bike and collect coins in specific time.

You can extend your time limit with collecting time from the road. The third mode is fuel, in this mode you will ride till your fuel is end. This mode has no time limits and no crashes, collect fuel tank from the road and enjoy endless ride of quad bike. This game also allows you nitro and magnet for collecting on the road; you can boost your motorbike with NOS and collect more coins with magnet.

This crazy quad bike racing game brings you the most stunning city, roads, buildings and environment, where you will enjoy ride of your motorbike. It is gives you real sensational quad bike racing experience with advanced level physics engine. Show your riding skills and ride your bike with real stunts.


--- Game Features ---

- Ride bike in multiple environment
- Different three modes for unlimited riding fun

- Realistic and Smooth Control System
- Tilt Your Smart Device to Control quad Bike left/right.
- Incredible Way for Riding
- Colorful and Charming Graphics
- Stunning Sound Effects
- Ride around the City Roads and Huge Buildings
